mapper.select: SELECT * from(SELECT rownum rum, human.* FROM (select imageUrl, genrenm, prfnm, prfpdfrom, prfpdto, fcltynm,a.mt20id from image e, concert a where e.mt20id = a.mt20id and a.genrenm=#{pType} and e.imagetype = 1 and a.prfpdfrom > sysdate order by prfpdfrom asc) human ) where rum BETWEEN 1 and 20

SELECT * from(SELECT rownum rum, human.* FROM (select imageUrl, genrenm, prfnm, prfpdfrom, prfpdto, fcltynm,a.mt20id from image e, concert a where e.mt20id = a.mt20id and e.imagetype = 1 and a.prfpdfrom > sysdate order by prfpdfrom asc) human ) where rum BETWEEN 1 and 20

SELECT * from(SELECT rownum rum, human.* FROM (select imageUrl, genrenm, prfnm, prfpdfrom, prfpdto, fcltynm,a.mt20id from image e, concert a where e.mt20id = a.mt20id and a.genrenm=#{pType} and e.imagetype = 1 and a.prfpdfrom > sysdate order by prfpdfrom asc) human ) where rum BETWEEN (#{stNum})*20+1 and ((#{stNum})+1)*20

SELECT * from(SELECT rownum rum, human.* FROM (select imageUrl, genrenm, prfnm, prfpdfrom, prfpdto, fcltynm,a.mt20id from image e, concert a where e.mt20id = a.mt20id and e.imagetype = 1 and a.prfpdfrom > sysdate order by prfpdfrom asc) human ) where rum BETWEEN (#{stNum})*20+1 and ((#{stNum})+1)*20
select imageUrl, genrenm, prfnm , mt20id from image natural join concert where mt20id = #{mt20id} AND imagetype = 1
select imageUrl, genrenm, prfnm, mt20id from image natural join concert where mt20id=#{mt20id} and imagetype = 2
select prfnm,prfpdfrom,prfpdto,fcltynm,prfcast,prfcrew,c.mt20id,imageurl from concert c ,image i where i.mt20id=c.mt20id and i.imagetype=1 and prfnm like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
